verses.verse: Now<WG1161> concerning<WG4012> spiritual<WG4152> gifts, brothers,<WG80> I would<WG2309> not have you ignorant.<WG50>
You know<WG1492> that you were Gentiles,<WG1484> carried<WG520> away<WG520> to these<WG3588> dumb<WG880> idols,<WG1497> even<WG5613> as you were led.<WG71>

Why<WG1352> I give you to understand,<WG1107> that no<WG3762> man<WG3762> speaking<WG2980> by the Spirit<WG4151> of God<WG2316> calls<WG3004> Jesus<WG2424> accursed:<WG331> and that no<WG3762> man<WG3762> can<WG1410> say<WG2036> that Jesus<WG2424> is the Lord,<WG2962> but by the Holy<WG40> Ghost.<WG4151>
Now<WG1161> there are diversities<WG1243> of gifts,<WG5486> but the same<WG846> Spirit.<WG4151>
And there are differences<WG1243> of administrations,<WG1248> but the same<WG846> Lord.<WG2962>
And there are diversities<WG1243> of operations,<WG1755> but it is the same<WG846> God<WG2316> which<WG3588> works<WG1754> all<WG3956> in all.<WG3956>
But the manifestation<WG5321> of the Spirit<WG4151> is given<WG1325> to every<WG1538> man<WG1538> to profit<WG4851> with.
For to one<WG3739> <WG3303> is given<WG1325> by the Spirit<WG4151> the word<WG3056> of wisdom;<WG4678> to another<WG243> the word<WG3056> of knowledge<WG1108> by the same<WG846> Spirit;<WG4151>
To another<WG2087> faith<WG4102> by the same<WG846> Spirit;<WG4151> to another<WG243> the gifts<WG5486> of healing<WG2386> by the same<WG846> Spirit;<WG4151>

To another<WG243> the working<WG1755> of miracles;<WG1411> to another<WG243> prophecy;<WG4394> to another<WG243> discerning<WG1253> of spirits;<WG4151> to another<WG2087> divers kinds<WG1085> of tongues;<WG1100> to another<WG243> the interpretation<WG2058> of tongues:<WG1100>
But all<WG3956> these<WG5023> works<WG1754> that one<WG1520> and the selfsame<WG846> Spirit,<WG4151> dividing<WG1244> to every<WG1538> man<WG1538> severally<WG2398> as he will.<WG1014>

For as the body<WG4983> is one,<WG1520> and has<WG2192> many<WG4183> members,<WG3196> and all<WG3956> the members<WG3196> of that one<WG1520> body,<WG4983> being<WG5607> many,<WG4183> are one<WG1520> body:<WG4983> so<WG3779> also<WG2532> is Christ.<WG5547>

For by one<WG1520> Spirit<WG4151> are we all<WG3956> baptized<WG907> into<WG1519> one<WG1520> body,<WG4983> whether<WG1535> we be Jews<WG2453> or<WG1535> Gentiles,<WG1672> whether<WG1535> we be bond<WG1401> or<WG1535> free;<WG1658> and have been all<WG3956> made<WG4222> to drink<WG4222> into<WG1519> one<WG1520> Spirit.<WG4151>
For the body<WG4983> is not one<WG1520> member,<WG3196> but many.<WG4183>
If<WG1437> the foot<WG4228> shall say,<WG2036> Because<WG3754> I am<WG1510> not the hand,<WG5495> I am<WG1510> not of the body;<WG4983> is it therefore<WG3756> not of the body?<WG4983>
And if<WG1437> the ear<WG3775> shall say,<WG2036> Because<WG3754> I am<WG1510> not the eye,<WG3788> I am<WG1510> not of the body;<WG4983> is it therefore<WG3756> not of the body?<WG4983>
If<WG1487> the whole<WG3650> body<WG4983> were an eye,<WG3788> where<WG4226> were the hearing?<WG189> If<WG1487> the whole<WG3650> were hearing,<WG189> where<WG4226> were the smelling?<WG3750>
But now<WG3570> has God<WG2316> set<WG5087> the members<WG3196> every<WG1538> one<WG1520> of them in the body,<WG4983> as it has pleased<WG2309> him.
And if<WG1487> they were all<WG3956> one<WG1520> member,<WG3196> where<WG4226> were the body?<WG4983>
But now<WG3568> are they many<WG4183> members,<WG3196> yet<WG1161> but one<WG1520> body.<WG4983>

And the eye<WG3788> cannot<WG3756> <WG1410> say<WG2036> to the hand,<WG5495> I have<WG2192> no<WG3756> need<WG5532> of you: nor<WG2228> again<WG3825> the head<WG2776> to the feet,<WG4228> I have<WG2192> no<WG3756> need<WG5532> of you.
No,<WG235> much<WG4183> more<WG3123> those<WG3588> members<WG3196> of the body,<WG4983> which seem<WG1380> to be more feeble,<WG772> are necessary:<WG316>

And those members of the body,<WG4983> which<WG3739> we think<WG1380> to be less<WG820> honorable,<WG820> on these<WG5125> we bestow<WG4060> more<WG4055> abundant<WG4055> honor;<WG5092> and our uncomely<WG809> parts have<WG2192> more<WG4055> abundant<WG4055> comeliness.<WG2157>

For our comely<WG2158> parts have<WG2192> no<WG3756> need:<WG5532> but God<WG2316> has tempered<WG4786> the body<WG4983> together,<WG4786> having given<WG1325> more<WG4055> abundant<WG4055> honor<WG5092> to that part which lacked.<WG5302>
That there should be no<WG3361> schism<WG4978> in the body;<WG4983> but that the members<WG3196> should have the same<WG846> care<WG3309> one<WG240> for another.<WG240>

And whether<WG1535> one<WG1520> member<WG3196> suffer,<WG3958> all<WG3956> the members<WG3196> suffer<WG4841> with it; or<WG1535> one<WG1520> member<WG3196> be honored,<WG1392> all<WG3956> the members<WG3196> rejoice<WG4796> with it.
Now<WG1161> you are the body<WG4983> of Christ,<WG5547> and members<WG3196> in particular.<WG3313>

And God<WG2316> has set<WG5087> some<WG3588> <WG3303> in the church,<WG1577> first<WG4412> apostles,<WG652> secondarily<WG1208> prophets,<WG4396> thirdly<WG5154> teachers,<WG1320> after<WG1899> that miracles,<WG1411> then<WG1534> gifts<WG5486> of healings,<WG2386> helps,<WG484> governments,<WG2941> diversities<WG1085> of tongues.<WG1100>
Are all<WG3956> apostles?<WG652> are all<WG3956> prophets?<WG4396> are all<WG3956> teachers?<WG1320> are all<WG3956> workers<WG1411> of miracles?<WG1411>
Have<WG2192> all<WG3956> the gifts<WG5486> of healing?<WG2386> do all<WG3956> speak<WG2980> with tongues?<WG1100> do all<WG3956> interpret?<WG1329>
But covet<WG2206> earnestly<WG2206> the best<WG2909> gifts:<WG5486> and yet<WG2089> show<WG1166> I to you a more<WG2596> <WG5236> excellent<WG2596> <WG5236> way.<WG3598>
